com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Interface IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaydiantGCMUtilityFacade

    public interface IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade
    Interface defining the utility methods to support GCM (Google Cloud Messaging) client registration on Paydiant Server. The operations defined here will be implemented using the IDeviceInfoManagerFacade methods.
    Since:
    4.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRegisteredForGCM()
      Checks whether the current device is registered with the Paydiant Server for any GCM notifications.
      void registerForGCM(String registrationId)
      Registers a client with the Paydiant Server for GCM notifications.
      void unregister()
      Removes the GCM registration ids from the Paydiant servers, so that the devices will not receive any further notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • registerForGCM

        void registerForGCM(String registrationId)
        Registers a client with the Paydiant Server for GCM notifications. This method will utilize IDeviceInfoManagerFacade methods to create/update an entry containing the registration id.

        Note: Calling this method will overwrite any previously registered values.
        Parameters:
        registrationId - Registration Id obtained from the Android GoogleCloudMessaging API
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.AdditionalInformationList)

      • isRegisteredForGCM

        boolean isRegisteredForGCM()
        Checks whether the current device is registered with the Paydiant Server for any GCM notifications.
        Returns:
        true if this device is already registered or not.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo() for applicable error codes
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()

      • unregister

        void unregister()
        Removes the GCM registration ids from the Paydiant servers, so that the devices will not receive any further notifications.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String...) for applicable error codes
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String...), IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.AdditionalInformationList)
